meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: Front Biomed Exceptional Fetal Bovine Serum (FBS, Exceptional) details and application examples.

product.name: Front Biomed Exceptional Fetal Bovine Serum (FBS, Exceptional)

desc.desc_basic: Highly universal; suitable for routine primary cells, stem cells, immune cells, and hard-to-culture tumor cells. Primary cells include epithelial, smooth muscle, endothelial, melanocytes, cardiomyocytes, macrophages, etc. Stem cells include NSC and UC-MSCs. Immune cells include H9, CTLL-2, peripheral-blood-derived NK and T cells. Tumor cells include breast, colorectal, gastric, lung and liver cancer cell lines.
desc.desc_cells: Hela, HCC1937, HT22, Caov3, NCI-H460, NCI-H146, CT26.WT, NRK-52E, A375, H9C2, L929, NCI-N87, COLO 205, BEP2D, HMy-2CIR, MDA-MB-453, MS751, RL95-2, SW 780, 22RV1, PK-15, A3, NCI-H82, OVCAR-3, BRL, Calu-3, SNU-387, MCF7, etc.
